<section class="steps-hero">

        <h1>MegaFood Delivered to Your Doorstep</h1>
        <p>Sign up for new subscription service and receive premium nutrition at a discount!</p>
    </header>

    <ol>
        <li data-step="1">
            <img alt="" src="https://via.placeholder.com/200x136" />
            <h2>Shop</h2>
            <p>Select the MegaFood supplements you want shipped to you</p>
        </li>
        <li data-step="2">
            <img alt="" src="https://via.placeholder.com/200x136" />
            <h2>Schedule</h2>
            <p>Choose your auto-deliver date and frequency</p>
        </li>
        <li data-step="3">
            <img alt="" src="https://via.placeholder.com/200x136" />
            <h2>Save</h2>
            <p>Enjoy 10% off every order, ever time and free 2-day shipping</p>
        </li>
    </ol>
</section>
 
<section class="steps-hero">
	<header style="background-image: url('https://via.placeholder.com/1323x592');">
		<h1>MegaFood Delivered to Your Doorstep</h1>
		<p>Sign up for new subscription service and receive premium nutrition at a discount!</p>
	</header>

			<p>Select the MegaFood supplements you want shipped to you</p>
		</li>
		<li data-step="2">
			<img alt="" src="https://via.placeholder.com/200x136" />

  • Content: 
    .steps-hero {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: px-to-rem(40px);

    header {
        background-color: $zuccini;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: left;
        background-size: cover;
        padding: px-to-rem(78px) $gutter-sm px-to-rem(306px) $gutter-sm;
        margin: 0 (-$gutter-sm);

        p {
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: px-to-rem(18px);
            line-height: 1.33;
            color: $white;
            max-width: px-to-rem(445px);
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
    }

    h1 {
        color: $white;
        max-width: px-to-rem(520px);
        margin: 0 auto px-to-rem(40px) auto;
    }

    h2 {
        color: $zuccini;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
    }

    p {
        font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    ol {
        @include remove-list();
        margin-top: px-to-rem(-205px);
    }

    li {
        position: relative;
        @include secondary-font(400);
        background-color: $white;
        padding: px-to-rem(48px) $gutter-sm px-to-rem(32px) $gutter-sm;
        border: 4px solid $wild-sand;
        max-width: px-to-rem(385px);
        margin: 0 auto px-to-rem(63px) auto;

        &::before {
            content: attr(data-step);
            position: absolute;
            top: px-to-rem(-40px);
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: px-to-rem(80px);
            width: px-to-rem(80px);
            font-size: px-to-rem(39.4px);
            font-weight: 600;
            color: $white;
            background-color: $saffron;
            border-radius: 50%;
        }

        &:last-of-type {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
    }

    img {
        display: block;
        margin: 0 auto px-to-rem(16px) auto;
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        header {
            padding-left: $gutter-lg;
            padding-right: $gutter-lg;
            margin: 0 (-$gutter-lg);
        }

        ol {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        li {
            width: calc(33.33% - #{px-to-rem(16px)});
            margin: 0;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {//~1100px +
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(64px);

        h1 {
            max-width: px-to-rem(665px);
        }

        header {
            padding-left: 8.33%;
            padding-right: 8.33%;
            margin: 0 -8.33%;

            p {
                font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
                max-width: px-to-rem(560px);
            }
        }
    }
}
